resources.string: First Certificate Free Practice text for English learners
1. Question: Please will you pass me ________ grapes?
2. I bought a new iPod so I can listen to ___ music I like when I am at the gym.
3. Reading and use of English: click what you should do (several answers possible
Read the sources, titles and subtitles of the texts where given; they are there to help you
try to answer any questions without referring carefully to the text.
Check that the completed paragraph makes sense in the passage as a whole (Part 6). The missing sentence must fit the overall context.
Make sure that you transfer your answers to the answer sheet accurately.

4. Complete the second sentence so that it has a similar meaning to the first sentence, using the word given. Do not change the word given. You must use between two and five words, including the word given
So that Susan would be fit for the skiing, she went to the gym three times a week.
Susan went to the gym three times a week ___________ fit for the skiing.
